鳫鳫鳫

鳫字的基本解释

鳫
yàn
古同“雁”。

鳫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《廣韻》五晏切，去諫，疑。］
亦作“鴈1”。
(1)候鸟名。形状略似鹅，颈和翼较长，足和尾较短，羽毛淡紫褐色。善于游泳和飞行。
(2)指鹅。
(3)雁为候鸟，每年春分后飞往北方，秋分后飞回南方，因以形容流动无定。参见“雁户”、“雁民”。
(4)雁是候鸟，秋分后飞回南方，因以指秋季。参见“雁天”、“雁宇”、“雁夜”。
(5)指书信。
(6)“贋”的古字。假；假的。
(7)通“顔”。喻前端。参见“雁行”。

鳫字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鳫； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1482第01
【字彙補】與鴈同。【廣韻】?鵞倉?鳫也。【曹憲註】鳫同雁。

鳫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鳫字的起名意思

暂无。

Turtle
Basic explanation of words
Turtle
yàn
Ancient "Goose".
Turtle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yàn］
["Guangyun" Five Yan cuts, go to admonish, doubt. ]
Also known as "Goose 1".
(1) The name of the migratory bird. The shape is slightly like a goose, with longer neck and wings, shorter feet and tail, and pale purple-brown feathers. Good at swimming and flying.
(2) Refers to goose.
(3) The geese are migratory birds and fly to the north after the spring equinox and fly back to the south after the autumn equinox. It is described as unsteady. See "Goose Household", "Goose Min".
(4) Geese are migratory birds and fly back to the south after the autumnal equinox, because they refer to autumn. See "Goose Sky", "Goose Yu", "Goose Night".
(5) Refers to correspondence.
(6) The ancient word for "pseudo". False; false.
(7) Through "Yan". Yu front end. See "Goose".
Turtle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鳫; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1482 No. 01
【Word Supplement】Same as geese. [Guang Yun]? Qiancang? Turtle also. [Cao Xian's Note] The torch is the same as the goose.
